name: cloudlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not include or contain clouds: The summers are as cloudlessly sunny as the winters are dark and cold. The full moon sailed cloudlessly among the stars, as if aware of her queenly majesty.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bright sun shone steadily and cloudlessly in the blue sky.The day had been, as usual, cloudlessly serene, but a gentle sea-breeze rose in the afternoon and brought with it a refreshing coolness. Today was cloudlessly fine so I went through the park on my way home.
